title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 349-2.4 - Date of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 349-2.4 - Date of hearing

State Regulations

The chairman shall, from time to time, prepare a calendar
of disputed bills and shall arrange a time and place of hearing. At least 30
days prior to the date set for hearing, notice thereof shall be mailed to the
therapist and carrier, advising the date, time and place of
hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
349-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
